original_text: That he who blesseth himself in the earth shall bless himself in the God of truth; and he that sweareth in the earth shall swear by the God of truth; because the former troubles are forgotten, and because they are hid from mine eyes.
korean_text: 이러므로 땅에서 자기를 위하여 복을 구하는 자는 진리의 하나님을 향하여 복을 구할 것이요 땅에서 맹세하는 자는 진리의 하나님으로 맹세하리니 이는 이전 환난이 잊어졌고 내 눈 앞에 숨겨졌음이라

sentences.original_text: That he who blesseth himself in the earth
shall bless himself in the God of truth
and he that sweareth in the earth
shall swear by the God of truth
because the former troubles are forgotten
and because they are hid from mine eyes
